attributes.action: Admit that although we are spinning at 1037.5 miles per hour, and careering around the sun at 66,600 miles per hour, there's no-one at the Wheel except for him and George!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We're out of control, God help us!!!!!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
